about_the_game:
You came to Found Sheep Farm to find belonging, to build community, and to reconnect with your friend Sonia, whom you haven’t seen in years. However, when you arrive, Sonia is nowhere to be seen: instead, you’re greeted by four cute and charming farmers and their retreat director, Mr. Sheppard, who all deny Sonia ever existed.

Oh, well! Now you have the summer to bond with your fellow farmers, complete daily chores with the help of your new friends, explore the charming grounds of the farm, and… wait. What was that in the woods?

This “dating sim” psychological horror title gives you the choice: Will you pull the wool over your eyes to find true happiness, or will your pursuit of the truth make you the black sheep?

WARNING: This game is not suitable for children or those who are easily disturbed.

Unearth the Hidden Mysteries of the Farmstead


Explore the farm at night through point and click adventure, but be careful, you never know when someone is watching.

Key Features

  • 10+ endings based on player choice.
  • Romance or bond with characters through dialogue, minigames, and choices.
  • Unlock 50+ steam achievements
